name: Project:StuntRush
description:
Stuntrush - its racing game 
inspired by Trackmania and other arcade racing games!
Game have stunt track and city location, and you cant beat your time by passing
white box, they record your best time.
For now game have only one car, and simple multiplayer, but in feautre i will continue updating and develop my game.

Have fun and join our discord: https://discord.gg/GhgMFVePum
